site.description: This site contains runtime and source features for EclipseLink JPA, MOXy and SDO components

category-def.name: dbws
category-def.label: EclipseLink DBWS
category-def.description: EclipseLink DBWS provides a Java-based, declarative Web Service solution for accessing relational databases.

category-def.name: dbwsbuilder
category-def.label: EclipseLink DBWS Builder
category-def.description: EclipseLink DBWS Builder provides Java-based tooling for developing Web Services for accessing relational databases.

category-def.name: jpa
category-def.label: EclipseLink Persistence (JPA)
category-def.description: EclipseLink JPA delivers a comprehensive open-source Java Object-Relational persistence solution.

category-def.name: moxy
category-def.label: EclipseLink MOXy
category-def.description: EclipseLink MOXy delivers a comprehensive open-source Java Object to XML binding solution.

category-def.name: nosql
category-def.label: EclipseLink NoSQL
category-def.description: EclipseLink NoSQL Extension allows users to interact with supported non-SQL Databases

category-def.name: sdo
category-def.label: EclipseLink SDO
category-def.description: EclipseLink SDO delivers a comprehensive open-source Java "Service Data Objects" solution.
